name: @jejunetwork/indexer
description: Comprehensive blockchain indexer for Jeju with web UI

scripts.dev:api: DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres bun run api/api-server.ts
scripts.dev:processor: DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres sqd process:dev
scripts.dev:graphql: DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres GQL_PORT=4350 sqd serve
scripts.dev:full: concurrently --kill-others "bun run dev:processor" "bun run dev:graphql" "PORT=4355 bun run scripts/dev.ts" "bun run dev:api"
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && tsc && bun build index.html --outdir dist/web --minify
